title: JSONSchema description of a Hyrrokkin Node Type
description: Specify how Hyrrokkin Node Types are defined in JSON

metadata.description: Attach metadata to this node type

name.description: Provide a short descriptive name for this node type

description.description: Provide a short description (~1 paragraph) of the purpose of this node type

enabled.description: whether this node type is enabled

dependencies.description: Provide a list of the paths/urls of resource dependencies, as understood by the executor

input_ports.description: Specify a mapping from an input port name to its definition

link_type.description: the link type of the port, qualified with the package name

allow_multiple_connections.description: whether this port allows more than one connection to other ports

output_ports.description: Specify a mapping from an output port name to its definition

link_type.description: the link type of the port, qualified with the package name

allow_multiple_connections.description: whether this port allows more than one connection to other ports

page.description: Specify how this node's content is displayed

url.description: Provide the URL of a page to display this node's content

display.description: Specify how this node is displayed in a network diagram

icon.description: Provide the URL of a SVG icon, relative to the package

corners.description: Define the shape of the node, in terms of the number of corners

style.description: Specify CSS styles to apply to this node's icon

classname.description: specify the python class implementing this node, for example (executor=python) this would look like package.subpackage.module.Class
